text:
@HillaryClinton Approx 80% of K-12 teachers are <40 & female.
Deaths from COVID19 of that age group? Approx 300
Females between 24-40? About 31% or 102,610,000 in US.
That is 0.00029236916479875256%

They are in no danger.
